name: Fractured Game Shows Quiz | Fractured TV | 10 Questions

questions.correct: Wheel of Fortune & The Wheel of Fortune
questions.explanation:
Wheel of Fortune & The Wheel of Fortune.

	With your host Pat Sajak and the lovely Vanna White.

Jeopardy! & Jeopardy.

	With your host Alex Trebek. Jeopardy was originally a daytime show with how Art Fleming. The prize money for correctly answering questions has risen from $10-$100 to $200-$2000.

Password.

	With your host Allan Ludden.

The Weakest Link & Weakest Link.

	With your not-so-genial hostess, Anne Robinson.

questions.text: Hugh once Tobey Emil yawn heir?
questions.correct: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? & Who Wants to be a Millionaire
questions.explanation:
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? & Who Wants to be a Millionaire.

	With your host Regis Philbin.

questions.correct: Let's Make a Deal & Let's Make a Deal! & Lets Make a Deal
questions.explanation:
Let's Make a Deal & Let's Make a Deal! & Lets Make a Deal.

	With your host Monty Hall and the lovely Carol Merrill.

The Newlywed Game & Newlywed Game.

	With your host Bob Eubanks.

Hollywood Squares.

	With your host Tom Bergeron and the lovely Whoopi Goldberg. Earlier hosts were Peter Marshall and John Davidson.

Family Feud & The Family Feud.

	With your host Richard Dawson.

The Dating Game & Dating Game.

	With your host Jim Lange. Thanks for playing! If anyone wants to send me interesting, quirky info concerning any of these games, please do. I will add it to the interesting info boxes.
